Texts.Chs: 一处新的大使馆最近在克里昂附近开办了，我想邀请你和我一起去那里。
Texts.Eng: A new embassy was recently opened near Creon, and I'd like to invite you to join me there.

Texts.Chs: 啊，很高兴再次收到你的回讯，大使！
Texts.Eng: Ah, it is good to hear from you again, ambassador!

Texts.Chs: 任何你在太空中发现的联盟飞船都应该装备一个传送器，可以把你带到克里昂大使馆。
Texts.Eng: Any Alliance vessels you find out in space should be equipped with a teleporter that can bring you to the Creon Embassy.

Texts.Chs: 在位于^orange;克里昂大使馆^reset;的^orange;戴蕾德^reset;处登记
快来克里昂看看吧，大使。我会等你的。
Texts.Eng: Come visit Creon soon, ambassador. I'll be waiting for you.

Texts.Chs: 给您，大使先生。专属于您的^orange;大大使通行证^reset;: 它将允许您^green;访问在克里昂大使馆最顶层^reset;的^orange;指挥中心reset;。
Texts.Eng: Here you are, ambassador. Your very own ^orange;Ambassador's Pass^reset;: it'll allow you to ^green;visit the ^orange;Command Center ^green;at the very top of the Creon Embassy^reset;.

Texts.Chs: 我收到了来自^orange;莱茵将军^reset;的信息，当时你正在外面探险。 ^green;如果你有时间的话，我现在就可以把它接通给你。^reset;
Texts.Eng: I have received a transmission from ^orange;Admiral Lyiin ^reset;while you were out exploring. ^green;I can patch it through to you now, if you have time.^reset;

Texts.Chs: 等你到了那里，你需要进入大使馆的上层，向大使馆大厅的秘书处报到。秘书会给你^orange;大使通行证^reset; 。
Texts.Eng: Once you're there, report to the secretary desk in the Embassy's lobby. The secretary will give you your ^orange;Ambassador's Pass^reset;, which you'll need to access the Embassy's upper levels.
